name: Bleh.
description:
Journey into a world inspired by Salad Fingers, Binding of Isaac, Alice in Wonderland and rambling fever dreams. Descend from the state of mild confusion downwards a spiral of madness.

At the core of the game there lie simple platforming mechanics that become more complex as it goes on. You explore environments ranging from meadows of gargantuan flowers to entire cities of transmission towers. Environments inhabited by such creatures as butterfly knights, jellyfish fungi and banana-people.*

Bleh. is a story that seeks to cause wonder and perplexion.

Bleh. is an expression of love for the experimental and the unconventional.

Bleh. is the first title of a Latvian project Neguli.

Bleh. is bleh.

* - almost none of which have currently been implemented in the game
